validators.message: Patient previously marked as on ART. Please provide the treatment category.
Patient  marked as on ART. Please provide the Regimen.
Patient marked as on ART. Please provide the Regimen.
Patient on ARVs. Please provide adherence history.
Patient marked as on ART in ART History section. Therefore plan can only be drug substitution, continue regimen, change dose, chage regimen, change
Patient marked as not on ART in ART History section. Therefore plan can only be None,Start
You indicated patient is (re)starting ART. Please provide reason.
You indicated patient is not (re)starting ART, therefore no reason for starting should be selected.
You indicated patient is changing/changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs, reason for changing should be selected.
You indicated patient is changing /changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to toxicity, cause should be selected.
You indicated patient is not changing/dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to toxicity, cause should be selected.
You indicated patient is changing /changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to other toxicity, indicate the other cause.
You indicated patient is not changing /changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs due to other toxicity, other cause is not required.
